title: The Big Boss
resume: Ye Mu Qi (Li Kai Xin) has good brains and thus manages to get first place in the whole school. Just because of that, she gets elected as the class president. But what nobody knows is that Mu Qi is actually the “Big Boss” of the street. When fate brings her once again together with her childhood friend Liao Dan Yi (Huang Jun Jie), an odd love story begins...
